name: Catch or Snatch 2016
description:
Graduation Video Game
School : ISART DIGITAL, the Video Game and 3D Animation / VFX School

Catch or Snatch is a two-player asymmetric game, that allows players to either be an art thief or the museum guard who tries to arrest him. Then switch roles to find out who's the best!

Platform: PC / Engine: Unity 5
Number of players: 2

Producer : Clément BOUC
Game Design : Guillaume LARUELLE and Pierre PRETI
Game Art : Benjamin ADAM, Kevin DARNIS and Nicolas RUFFIN
Game Design & Programming : Leo WILS
Game Programming : Damien VANHILLE
Music & Sound Design : Loïc AMIOT
